content: Integrate recursive decomposition capabilities from meta_cognitive_agent.py into EnhancedDirectorAgent
Add meta-cognitive reflection and learning capabilities with issue detection
Implement adaptive execution plan modification based on real-time feedback
Add execute_complex method for autonomous execution of complex multi-step tasks
Enhance pattern learning and storage in tri-memory system for continuous improvement
Implement supporting methods for recursive decomposition (_analyze_recursive_complexity, _decompose_recursively_with_depth, etc.)
Test the enhanced Director agent with a complex task example
